segments.text: I need to stop eating such unhealthy foods .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know what you mean . I've started eating better myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What foods do you eat now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I tend to stick to fruits , vegetables , and chicken .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Those are the only things you eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why aren't you eating anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , fruits and vegetables are very healthy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's really healthy to eat when you bake it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess that does sound a lot healthier .
segments.speaker: S1
